comment.author: 24719865@N03
comment._content: This is a good picture, I like the layout of the photo. The lighting or lack there of makes it more subtle.

comment.author: 67652909@N03
comment._content: Notice all of the photos of this event are candids shot from a distance, as if the photographer did not want to intrude. A gesture of respect from a probable white photographer? Or was he just keeping his distance?
